description: Small numerical value or status descriptor for UI elements.
name: Badge
usage:
Badges are generally used for emphasizing a numerical value of an object, e.g., the number of unread items in a folder. Other uses may include communicating status and other types of non-critical notifications in the application interface. #### Informational Badge Markup Example ```html Badge Label Badge: Small Badge: Large Badge: Flag Style Badge: Error Badge: Warning Badge: Healthy Badge: Important Badge: Information ``` #### Notification Badge Markup Example ```html 3 [icon] ``` #### Notification Text Badge Markup Example ```html 3 {{badgeLabel}} ``` #### Initial Avatar + Status Badge Markup Example ```html
